column4: I've enabled Sync to VBlank in nvidia-settings, but I have to reenable it every time I boot up.
Add "nvidia-settings --load-config" (or something similar, see man nvidia-settings) to your session start up.
ok, the problem is Beryl has to be started after that.
Odd, because *I've* installed it from Feisty's universe
maybe you installed from their .deb and you thought you had installed from the repos...
maybe you added a 3rd party repo?
https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/deluge-torrent - it *was* in Feisty, and is in edgy-backports and gutsy.
Maybe it's currently in a state of flux while being backported to Fesity?
why was it removed from feisty?
why would it be in edgy-backports but not any feisty repos?
As I said, maybe it's been accidentally removed as a part of a backport.
